snippet: The deal with two former Bear Stearns hedge fund managers averts a second trial over charges that they had misled investors.
abstract: The deal with two former Bear Stearns hedge fund managers averts a second trial over charges that they had misled investors.

headline.main: S.E.C. Reaches Settlement in Bear Stearns Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Settlement By S.E.C. In Subprime Fraud Case
